backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, vendor, order, user, and storage types plus maps for storing marketplace data and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for PWA manifest completeness, icons, service worker behavior, and A2HS support with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI behavior of various frontend React pages and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Explains fixes for production build issues, including adding tsconfig files and shimming process.env via Vite.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable setup using OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting PWA metadata, linking the manifest and icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, start URL, standalone mode, and a full icon set including maskable icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient branding, message, and retry button for service worker use.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker managing precaching, cache cleanup, and fetch strategies for offline support and asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining all public, customer, vendor, and admin routes using TanStack Router within an AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: Provides an error boundary for admin pages, logging detailed diagnostics and showing a fallback UI. Includes copy-to-clipboard diagnostics for easier debugging.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Displays the admin navigation tabs with links to dashboard sections. Highlights the active tab based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/admin/VendorDocu: Shows a dialog listing a vendor’s uploaded documents with view and download options. Fetches documents based on the vendor’s principal.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper handling vendor post-login redirects and rendering top nav, bottom nav, and install banner around page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with optional admin tools and diagnostic error details. Allows refreshing access or triggering admin-role assignment.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Wrapper that ensures a user is authenticated before viewing admin routes. Redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity auth. Handles login state, logout clearing, and recovery from already-authenticated errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts newly authenticated users to create a profile when none exists. Saves name, email, phone, and address through backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Component that conditionally renders children based on required user role with detailed admin-state handling and access-denied logic.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar that switches menu items based on detected user role and shows cart badges and active states.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button that applies primary CTA styling and forwards props.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Product deal card showing image, deal badge, discount pricing, and linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input component with floating label behavior using peer styling.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating, swipe-enabled hero banner slider that links users to store-category pages based on slide selection.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Grid display for products with loading skeletons, discount and stock badges, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSInstallB: Banner prompting users to install the PWA, with install and dismiss actions driven by useA2HS state.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge that displays order status text and styling via utility helpers.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with search, logo, user role detection, and cart count. Handles search navigation and adapts layout for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/vendor/EditOutle: Dialog form allowing vendors to edit outlet details, upload photos, and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorTab: Navigation tabs for vendor dashboard linking to main vendor routes with active-state styling.
frontend/src/constants/storeCategories.t: Defines store category options and helpers for labels, parsing, and slugs.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static vendor list with basic shop metadata for sample or mock data.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Hook managing add-to-home-screen installability, prompt handling, and install state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Lightweight hook that reads actor query state from React Query cache via external store subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, roles, and vendor/customer info using an actor and identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes for marketplace UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the service's mission and features using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Fetches and displays admin analytics including vendor, order, sales, and commission stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards for vendors, orders, and quick actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with city filtering and allows admins to update order statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product management including listing, creating, editing, and deleting products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Manages vendor approval, outlet status, payments, and document viewing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's shopping cart, handles pricing and checkout navigation, and shows states for unauthenticated, loading, or empty carts.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product categories in a grid with loading skeletons and gradient-themed category cards.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products for a selected category with sorting options and a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items, calculates total, and submits an order before clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and contact info cards, simulating message submission.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer’s profile details and role information.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays a customer’s order history with status badges and order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays the user's wishlist by fetching wishlist and product data, showing loading skeletons, an empty state, or product cards with pricing and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows hero banners, login buttons, featured deals, and category navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation and saves login data before navigating to the vendor list based on the selected city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details including photo upload and validates inputs, saving the data and navigating to the vendor dashboard upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a vendor dashboard summarizing registration success and displaying outlet, location, and contact details from stored onboarding data.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city, providing shop info and navigation to individual vendor pages, with empty states for missing or unmatched cities.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Renders a vendor login form with validation and category selection, saving data and routing to the outlet details page upon success.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays a vendor’s shop details using a vendorId param, with fallback UI if the vendor is not found.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, image carousel, pricing, reviews, and supports adding to cart and posting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/store/StoreCategoryVe: Lists vendors for a given store category with loading, error, and empty states, and handles invalid category routes.
Shows a vendor shop with owner-only product management including add, edit, delete, and image handling based on store category.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing product count, orders, sales, and wallet/outlet status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Displays vendor orders with loading and empty states, showing order details and status.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Interface for vendors to view, add, edit, and delete products with a modal form and category support.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProfileP: Renders the vendor profile page showing vendor info, outlet details, and loading states using queries and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorWalletPa: Displays vendor wallet status, commission warnings, outlet disable alerts, and sales totals with loading handling.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic mapping of category IDs to predefined gradient color classes.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Exports a helper to find a category by case-insensitive name match.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utilities for extracting, formatting, and generating diagnostics text from unknown errors.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats bigint or number values into INR currency strings safely.
frontend/src/utils/maskAadhaar.ts: Masks Aadhaar numbers to show only the last four digits.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing onboarding-related data in sessionStorage for customers and vendors.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Safe numeric conversion and formatting helpers to prevent crashes from invalid numbers.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to class names and text labels, including stock availability styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type declarations for Vite environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system, custom radii, shadows, and accordion animations using several plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Sets TypeScript options for Vite’s Node-side config with strict mode, no emit, and ESNext module resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite build and dev-server settings, React plugin, path aliasing, env shims, manual chunking, and esbuild global definitions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for adding full PWA installability including manifest, icons, service worker, offline caching, and mobile install prompt.
